name: Dire Wolf
flavor: A large wolf with menacing teeth, seldom encountered alone.

features.name: Pack Tactics - Passive
features.desc: If the Wolf makes a successful standard attack and another Dire Wolf is within Melee range of the target, deal 1d6+5 physical damage instead of their standard damage and you gain a Fear.

features.name: Hobbling Strike - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to make an attack against a target within Melee range. On a success, deal 3d4+10 direct physical damage and make them Vulnerable until they clear at least 1 HP.
